I would recommend watching "Spring Breakers." The movie follows four college girls who come up against the law after holding up a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation. While partying, drinking, and taking drugs, they are arrested, only to be bailed out by a drug and arms dealer.
I would also recommend watching "Running with Scissors." The movie follows Mangal, a taxi driver, who comes across a damsel in distress who is being molested by two thugs. Mangal gallants rescues her and attempts to take her to her destination, to no avail, as the person she is looking for has moved.
I would also recommend watching "The Salon." The movie follows a beauty-shop owner named Monica Calhoun, who comes across a young woman named Mala, who is being pursued by two thugs. Monica Calhoun and Mala team up to fight off the thugs, ultimately rescuing Mala and returning her home safely.
I would also recommend watching "Taxi Driver." The movie follows Joe Spinell as he plays the role of Taxi Driver Ratanlal, who becomes obsessed with preventing crime in his city by any means necessary. Throughout the movie, Ratanlal encounters various obstacles and challenges that he must overcome in order to achieve his goals. Despite facing these obstacles and challenges, Ratanlal perseveres and ultimately succeeds in achieving his goals.
